author: gkalpak
message:
build: use the latest versions of Chrome (v87) and Firefox (v84) in tests (#40150)

This commit updates the versions of Chrome and Firefox used in tests -
both with Bazel and without (via Puppeteer) - to the latest:
- Chrome v87
- Firefox v84

PR Close #40150
